statements: SELECT material_name, price FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, category, price FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE material_id = 5;
SELECT category, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM materials GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 123 ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC, material_id
SELECT material_id, material_name, category FROM materials WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY material_id ASC
SELECT material_name, price FROM materials WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 AND price < 500 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC, material_id DESC
SELECT category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM materials GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM materials WHERE material_type='Wood';
SELECT * FROM materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM materials WHERE supplier_id=1;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_type='Wood' AND supplier_name='ABC Suppliers';
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM materials WHERE material_id=2 ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT material_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM materials GROUP BY material_type HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM materials GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_materials DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM materials WHERE supplier_contact LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM material;
SELECT material_name, price FROM material ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM supplier WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, quantity_on_hand FROM material WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity_on_hand ASC;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name FROM material m JOIN material_supplier ms ON m.material_id = ms.material_id JOIN supplier s ON ms.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM material;
SELECT material_name, material_type, quantity_on_hand, price FROM material;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email, phone_number FROM supplier;

SELECT material_id, material_name, supplier_name, price FROM material JOIN material_supplier ON material.material_id = material_supplier.material_id JOIN supplier ON material_supplier.supplier_id = supplier.supplier_id;
SELECT material_name, material_type, quantity_on_hand FROM material WHERE quantity_on_hand > 100;
SELECT * FROM materials
SELECT material_name, price FROM materials
SELECT supplier_name, address, phone_number FROM suppliers
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects
SELECT project_id, material_id, quantity FROM project_materials
SELECT material_name, price FROM materials WHERE material_category='Metal' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, address, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%Avenue%' ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date;

SELECT project_name, material_name, quantity FROM projects p JOIN project_materials pm ON p.project_id = pm.project_id JOIN materials m ON pm.material_id = m.material_id WHERE pm.quantity > 100 ORDER BY project_name;
SELECT material_category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM materials GROUP BY material_category ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_id, price FROM supplier_materials WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, quantity FROM project_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM materials JOIN supplier_materials ON materials.material_id = supplier_materials.material_id
SELECT material_id, material_name, supplier_name FROM materials JOIN suppliers ON materials.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(supplier_id) AS total_supplied_materials FROM suppliers JOIN supplier_materials ON suppliers.supplier_id = supplier_materials.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name
SELECT SUM(price) AS total_material_cost FROM supplier_materials
